Skills.SkillRollTooltip: Shows the skill roll dialog. Shift-clicking rolls a skill check applying no modifier and assumes a difficulty of 8
Skills.InvertedSkillRollTooltip: Rolls a skill check applying no modifier and assumes a difficulty of 8. Shift-clicking shows the skill roll dialog

Handlebars.CantShowCharacteristic: You need to reselect the characteristic for all skills marked with XXX. Sorry...

Skills.SimplifiedSkillNameDescription:
Used in roll formulas as @skills._SKILL_NAME_.
@skills._SKILL_NAME__ defaults to zero if the skill is missing or below zero.

Ship.InvalidDocumentForShipPosition: This document type is invalid for ship positions. Only skills can be dropped here.
Ship.ActorMustBeSelectedForAction: Since there are multiple actors, one must be selected to perform the action
Ship.CantDropActorIfPositionIsNotOnShip: You can't drop a Traveller on a ship position that is not on a ship
Ship.Name: Name

Migration.Completed: Twodsix System Migration to version {version} completed!
Migration.DoNotClose: Migrating Twodsix to {version}. Do not close your game or shut down your server.
Migration.MigrationError0.6.25: Migration error: Couldn't parse price for ${name}, it was ${price} but is now 0.

compendiumFolders.missing: The included compendiums for the various Cepheus variants often use the 'Compendium Folders' module. If you use those, please install the Compendium Folders module in Foundry VTT. Or turn off this warning in System Settings.
compendiumFolders.disabled: Please enable the 'Compendium Folders' module in this world if you intend to use the included compendiums. Or turn off this warning in System Settings.

ruleset.hint: This will configure the below settings with the best options for the given ruleset. Note that the rulesets at the top are the best supported ones. See https://github.com/xdy/twodsix-foundryvtt/blob/master/docs/docs.md for details. Rules relating to the ruleset are marked with a green border. Any changes to settings set by the ruleset will be marked with an orange border.
ruleset.name: Ruleset

absoluteBonusValueForEachTimeIncrement.hint: Leave empty to use default (+/-1). Not currently used.
absoluteBonusValueForEachTimeIncrement.name: What bonus/penalty to give per each time increment change in a task.

absoluteCriticalEffectValue.hint: Defaults to 99, which means that effect is ignored.
absoluteCriticalEffectValue.name: What effect is required for a throw to be considered a critical success/failure (i.e. be colored green/red).

automateDamageRollOnHit.hint: checked=Roll damage, modified by effect of skill roll. unchecked=Don't roll damage.
automateDamageRollOnHit.name: Automatically roll damage on skill rolls that hit (i.e. get effect > 0) with items that do damage?

criticalNaturalAffectsEffect.hint: checked=Regardless of success consider a natural 2 to have an effect of -1 and a 12 to have an effect of 0, unchecked=Use normal rules
criticalNaturalAffectsEffect.name: Whether a natural 2 or 12 should have special treatment as regards to success/failure.

defaultTokenSettings.hint: Automatically set advised prototype token settings to newly created Actors.
defaultTokenSettings.name: Default Prototype Token Settings

effectOrTotal.hint: checked=Show effect (i.e. roll+modifiers-target number, usually 8), unchecked=Show total (i.e. roll+modifiers)
effectOrTotal.name: Show effect or total roll value for skill and characteristic rolls.

modifierForZeroCharacteristic.hint: Leave empty to use default (-2). Does not automatically recalculate modifiers for existing characters.
modifierForZeroCharacteristic.name: Modifier for characteristic value of zero.

showMissingCompendiumWarnings.hint: Whether to show warnings for missing/disabled modules on world start.
showMissingCompendiumWarnings.name: Show warnings about missing/disabled modules.

systemMigrationVersion.hint: Records the schema version for the Twodsix system. (Don't modify this unless you know what you are doing)
systemMigrationVersion.name: System Schema Version

termForAdvantage.hint: Don't use the same as for termForDisadvantage...
termForAdvantage.name: What you want to call rolls with advantage (3d6kh2).

termForDisadvantage.hint: Don't use the same as for termForAdvantage...
termForDisadvantage.name: What you want to call rolls with disadvantage (3d6kl2).

ShowLawLevel.hint: checked=Show the 'Law Level' field, unchecked=Hide it
ShowLawLevel.name: Show the 'Law Level' field on weapon sheets

ShowRecoil.name: Show the 'Recoil' field on weapon sheets

ShowRateOfFire.name: Show the 'Rate of Fire' field on weapon sheets
ShowRateOfFire.hint: checked=Show the 'Rate of Fire' field, unchecked=Hide it

ShowDamageType.hint: checked=Show the 'Damage Type' field, unchecked=Hide it
ShowDamageType.name: Show the 'Damage Type' field on weapon sheets

ShowWeaponType.hint: checked=Show the 'Weapon Type' field, unchecked=Hide it
ShowWeaponType.name: Show the 'Weapon Type' field on weapon sheets

ShowRangeBandAndHideRange.name: Show 'Range Band' and *hide* 'Range' on weapon sheets and the character sheet

autofireRulesUsed.hint: Select which variant's auto/burst fire rules should be used.
autofireRulesUsed.name: Select which variant's auto/burst fire rules should be used.

difficultyListUsed.hint: Select which variant's difficulty list should be used.
difficultyListUsed.name: Select which variant's difficulty list should be used.

difficultiesAsTargetNumber.hint: checked=Use target number rather than modifier for difficulties, unchecked=Use modifiers
difficultiesAsTargetNumber.name: Use target numbers rather than modifiers for difficulties.

ExperimentalFeatures.hint: checked=Boldly use ugly and buggy experimental features that just maybe won't delete your game world, unchecked=Hide them like any sane person would
ExperimentalFeatures.name: Show ugly, buggy and unfinished features. I.e., kind of like all the other features that are not hidden by this flag. :)

hideUntrainedSkills.hint: checked=Show pseudo-skill 'Untrained' instead of all untrained skills. unchecked=Show all untrained skills
hideUntrainedSkills.name: Hide all untrained skills, instead show a single pseudo-skill named 'Untrained'. This also makes it so new skills are added at 0 instead of the untrained skill value.
hideUntrainedSkills.warningReset: After saving the system settings all skills using the pseudo-skill Untrained will be permanently reset to using no skill.This action cannot be undone.
hideUntrainedSkills.warningUpdateWeapon: After saving the system settings all actors' weapons that do not have a skill will be updated to use the pseudo-skill Untrained.This action cannot be undone.

invertSkillRollShiftClick.hint: Clicking on a skill roll or dragging damage to a character normally shows a dialog, shift-clicking applies default values (Average skill roll or automatic damage distribution). Checking this box swaps this behavior.
invertSkillRollShiftClick.name: Invert behavior for shift-clicking for skill rolls and shift-dragging for taking damage

lifebloodInsteadOfCharacteristics.hint: Show END and 'Lifeblood' (uses STR below the covers) as characteristics. Useful for Cepheus Atom, Barbaric!, etc.
lifebloodInsteadOfCharacteristics.name: Show END and 'Lifeblood' (STR) as characteristics.

showContaminationBelowLifeblood.hint: Show Contamination below Lifeblood. Only useful along with the 'show END and lifeblood' setting.
showContaminationBelowLifeblood.name: Show Contamination below Lifeblood.

useSystemDefaultTokenIcon.hint: Use Foundry VTT system default token icon (mystery man) instead of Twodsix default icon when creating new actor.  Check this setting when using custom images so that the system automatically sets token image to be the same as the actor image.
useSystemDefaultTokenIcon.name: Use Foundry VTT rather than Twodsix default token icon for new actors.

showLifebloodStamina.hint: Show Lifeblood and Stamina characteristics on actor sheet.  Damage will be applied to these characteristics.  Useful for Cepheus Deluxe.
showLifebloodStamina.name: Show Lifeblood and Stamina characteristics and use for damage.

weightModifierForWornArmor.hint: Factor to multiply the weight value of a armor if it is currently equipped.
weightModifierForWornArmor.name: Factor to multiply the weight value of a equipped armor.

showHeroPoints.hint: Show Hero Points counter on actor sheet.
showHeroPoints.name: Show Hero Points

showSingleComponentColumn.hint: Show the ship components list as a single row.
showSingleComponentColumn.name: Ship components listed as single row

useFoundryStandardStyle.hint: Use Foundry's default style for user interface.  This should make some modules more compatible with TWODSIX
useFoundryStandardStyle.name: Use Foundry Standard Style

showAlternativeCharacteristics.hint: Show alternative characteristics instead of PSI. Only works for the Foundry default style.
showAlternativeCharacteristics.name: Show alternative characteristics

alternativeShort1.hint: Short name for first alternative characteristic. It should be four characters or fewer.
alternativeShort1.name: Short name for alternative characteristic 1

alternativeShort2.hint: Short name for second alternative characteristic. It should be four characters or fewer.
alternativeShort2.name: Short name for alternative characteristic 2

useWoundedStatusIndicators.hint: Uses status indicators to indicate wounded status and automatically roll unconcious saves on serious wounds.
useWoundedStatusIndicators.name: Display wounded status indicators

useModuleFixStyle.hint: Modifies CSS style to correct identified style issues for certain modules when using the Twodsix style.  It doesn't work when using Foundry default style.
useModuleFixStyle.name: Correct some css style issues due to modules and default Twodsix style.

itemSettings.name: Item Settings
itemSettings.hint: Configure the item fields that are shown.

Errors.NoSkillForSkillRoll: You tried to perform a skill roll without specifying a skill
Errors.NoCharacteristicForRoll: You tried to perform a characteristics roll without specifying a characteristic
Errors.NoROFForAttack: Rate of fire must be specified for this attack
Errors.NoDamageForWeapon: This weapon has not specified the damage it does
Errors.NoAmmo: You are out of ammunition. You need to reload before shooting!
Errors.EmptyConsumable: There is no consumable supply left.  You need to refill!
Errors.OnlyOwnedItems: Can only drop to items that are owned by an actor
Errors.DraggingSomething: Dragging something that can't be dragged
Errors.OnlyDropConsumables: Only consumables can be dropped on an item.
Errors.CouldNotFindItem: Could not find an item with id: _ITEM_ID_
Errors.DraggedCompendiumIsNotItem: The dragged compendium object is not an item.

Warnings.ActorMissingItem: Your controlled Actor does not have an item with id: _ITEM_ID_
Warnings.AutoDamageForMultipleTargetsNotImplement: Automatically damaging multiple targets (using Auto X) is currently not supported
Warnings.MaxStatVal: The value exceededs the maximum stat value
Warnings.StatValBelowZero: The value cannot be below zero
Warnings.DecreaseEnduranceFirst: Endurance/Stamina should be decreased before other stats
Warnings.CantAutoDamageShip: Automatic damage of ship is not supported
Warnings.CantDragOntoActor: This item can't be dragged onto this actor
